cards.name: Arya Stark
cards.text: Shadow (4). Stealth. Reaction: After Arya Stark enters play, place a prayer token on up to 5 different characters you don't control. If Arya Stark leaves play, discard those tokens. Reaction: After a character with a prayer token is killed, stand Arya Stark and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Blood of the First Men
cards.text: Character you control only. Attached character gains the Old Gods trait. Action: During a challenge in which you control a participating [stark] character, kneel attached character to have it participate in the challenge on your side.

cards.name: The Queen's Retinue
cards.text: Shadow (4). Action: Put The Queen's Retinue into play from shadows. Then, each opponent draws 2 cards.

cards.name: Huntress
cards.text: While Huntress is standing, each [tyrell] character you control with printed cost 3 or lower gets +1 STR. Action: Kneel Huntress to choose a [tyrell] character with printed cost 3 or lower. It gets +3 STR until the end of the phase.

cards.name: Recruit from the Dungeons
cards.text: Shadow (2). Action: During a challenge in which you are the defending player, kneel Recruit from the Dungeons to have it participate in the challenge on your side. If you lose the challenge, return Recruit from the Dungeons to shadows.

cards.name: Rimegate
cards.text: Interrupt: When another location you control would be discarded from play, kneel Rimegate to save it.
cards.flavor: Hoarfrost Hill and Rimegate still lacked garrisons, so Jon had asked their views on which of the remaining wildling chiefs and war lords might be best suited to hold them.

cards.name: Robert Baratheon
cards.text: Renown. Reaction: After Robert Baratheon gains power, gain 1 power for your faction. (Limit twice per round.)
cards.flavor: "I swear to you, I was never so alive as when I was winning this throne, or so dead now that I've won it."

cards.name: Long May He Reign
cards.text: King character only. Attached character cannot be killed. Forced Reaction: After you lose a [power] challenge as the defending player, sacrifice Long May He Reign.

cards.name: The Bastard of Driftmark
cards.text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge in which The Bastard of Driftmark is participating, choose and stand a location.
cards.flavor: Aurane Waters, the dashing young Bastard of Driftmark, would be her grand admiral.

cards.name: Alchemists' Guildhall
cards.text: Shadow (2). Interrupt: When the effects of a triggered character ability would initiate, if that character does not have shadow, kneel and return Alchemists' Guildhall to shadows to cancel those effects. (Max 1 per phase.)

cards.name: Blackwater Raiders
cards.text: Shadow (3). Reaction: After Blackwater Raiders comes out of shadows, choose a location with printed cost 2 or lower in an opponent's discard pile. Put it into play under your control.

cards.name: Fishmonger's Square
cards.text: Marshaling Action: If there are 10 or more cards in an opponent's discard pile, kneel Fishmonger's Square to draw 1 card and gain 1 gold.

cards.name: Ser Jorah Mormont
cards.text: Shadow (4). No attachments except Weapon. Interrupt: When Ser Jorah Mormont is discarded from your hand, put him into shadows instead of placing him in your discard pile.

cards.name: Mercenary Contract
cards.text: Attached character gains the Mercenary trait. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which attached character is attacking, pay 1 gold and kneel Mercenary Contract to stand attached character.

cards.name: Friends at Court
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Friends at Court comes out of shadows, look at up to 3 cards in shadows. Then, you may pay 2 gold to choose 1 of those cards and return it to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Poisoned Dagger
cards.text: Character you control only. Shadow (2). Attached character gets +2 STR. Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge in which attached character is participating, sacrifice Poisoned Dagger to have the losing opponent choose and kill a participating character he or she controls.

cards.name: The Iron Throne
cards.text: Reaction: After a phase begins, kneel The Iron Throne to name a card. Until the end of the phase, that card cannot be marshaled, played, or put into play.

cards.name: Valyrian Steel
cards.text: Your minimum deck size is 75 cards. Your deck cannot include more than 1 copy of each attachment (by title). Action: Kneel your faction card and pay X gold to put an attachment with printed cost X into play from your hand. Reaction: After an attachment enters play under your control, either: draw a card or gain 1 gold. (Limit 3 times per round.)
cards.designer: Card design by 2015 Melee World Champion, Corey Faherty.

cards.name: City of Wealth
cards.text: Increase the gold, initiative, and reserve values on this plot card by 1 for each City plot card in your used pile.

cards.name: Expose Duplicity
cards.text: When Revealed: Discard each card in shadows.
